TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant obtained a contract from ORG to carry out repair work in CARDINAL public schools in LOC in order to render them operational .

CARDINAL . At DATE , however , he noticed that some of the schools had not yet been fully constructed . He applied to ORG in PERSON and requested the contract to be annulled . He submitted that the payment agreed on for the repairs was too low , given the amount of work needed to complete the construction of those schools .
CARDINAL . ORG requested the applicant to start the construction and the repairs , reassuring him that he would be reimbursed for his additional work .

CARDINAL . After having completed the construction , the applicant applied to ORG and requested additional compensation of MONEY ( TRL ) . However , his repeated efforts proved fruitless as no payment was made .
CARDINAL . On DATE he filed an action with ORG and claimed the outstanding amount of GPE CARDINAL plus interest .

CARDINAL . On an unspecified date , the court appointed an expert to determine the amount of additional payment that the applicant was entitled to recover . However , the expert failed to submit his report .
CARDINAL . In the absence of the expert report , the court ordered on - site visits to the schools in order to establish the additional work carried out by the applicant .
CARDINAL . On DATE the members of the court , accompanied by new experts , conducted an on - site examination at the schools .
CARDINAL . On an unspecified date , the experts submitted their calculation of the sums incurred by the applicant for the additional work .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG awarded the applicant TRL CARDINAL plus interest calculated at CARDINAL different rates depending on the relevant period of time , i.e. , PERCENT per annum running from DATE to CARDINAL DATE ; PERCENT per annum from DATE to DATE ; and at the rediscount rate running from DATE until the date of payment .
CARDINAL . The applicant appealed . In his petition to ORG he complained about the loss that he had suffered as a result of the high rate of inflation during the proceedings before the civil court .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the decision of the civil court . On DATE the same court dismissed the applicant 's request for rectification .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was paid the total amount of GPE CARDINAL , consisting of the capital plus interest incurred until the payment date .
